article_title: Rashida Jones Hot Girls Wanted Documentary Netflix
article_text:
Movies

An Exciting Finding Dory Scene

On Tuesday, a brand-new trailer for Finding Dory was released. The sequel to 2003's Finding Nemo stars Ellen DeGeneres as the voice of the lovable fish with short-term memory problems, Dory. With a sequel of this magnitude, people tend to get really excited about spotting clues for new characters and plot points. But ...

Carolyn L. Todd

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Lauren Le Vine
article_metadata.description: Netflix has acquired the rights to Rashida Jones' documentary Hot Girls Wanted.
